text: Lekin Dāūd ne qasam khā kar isrār kiyā, “Zāhir hai ki āp ko is ke bāre meṅ ilm nahīṅ. Āp ke bāp ko sāf mālūm hai ki maiṅ āp ko pasand hūṅ. ‘Wuh to sochte hoṅge, Yūnatan ko is bāt kā ilm na ho, warnā wuh dukh mahsūs karegā.’ Lekin Rab kī aur āp kī jān kī qasam, maiṅ baṛe ḳhatre meṅ hūṅ, aur maut se bachnā mushkil hī hai.”
